action.action-desc: Mr. Walberg introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to clarify entrance privileges for vehicles with respect to the America the Beautiful interagency pass.

section.text: Section 805(a)(7) of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act (16 U.S.C. 6804(a)(7)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking The Secretaries shall issue guidelines and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: For purposes of this paragraph, where a National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass is used for access to Federal recreational lands and waters on a per-vehicle fee basis, such Pass shall cover the entrance fee and standard amenity recreation fee—

clause.text: for the passholder and any passengers accompanying the passholder in a single private, noncommercial vehicle; or
if the passholder is entering by motorcyle—

subclause.text: the passholder and any passengers on the motorcyle; and
one additional motorcycle, including passengers, accompanying the passholder.
